title: Tallulah Willis' revealing Halloween costume pays homage to dad Bruce Willis
text:
Tallulah Willis is paying homage to father Bruce Willis’ career through her Halloween costume this year.

Willis shared a revealing image of her “Fifth Element”-inspired Halloween costume on Sunday.

Adorned in an orange wig and a minimal white bandage outfit, Willis' outfit channels Milla Jovovich’s character, Leeloo, from the 1997 film.

DEMI MOORE SAYS BRUCE WILLIS WAS 'CONTROLLING' DURING MARRIAGE, WANTED HER TO BE STAY-AT-HOME MOM

“Seno Akta Gamat,” the daughter of Willis and Demi Moore captioned the image — referencing Leeloo’s language from the film.

The outfit showed off her toned physique, as she posed against a concrete wall while gazing into the distance.

The photo was shared in the wake of Tallulah’s recent post about mental health.

RUMER WILLIS FIRES BACK AT TROLL WHO SAYS SHE DOESN'T WORK HARD

Willis made the revelation in early October that while she appeared to be her usual lively self in a video she first posted in December 2018, in reality, she was dealing with intense suicidal thoughts.

“We are not what we show,” she captioned a video of herself dancing vibrantly in a bright pink bikini, pink ball cap and black sunglasses in recognition of World Mental Health Day.

“When I filmed this video, I remember everyone telling me over and over how much they wished they had my energy, my freeness, a ownership of self,” the 25-year-old wrote. “When this video was filmed I was 3 months into the deepest suicidal hole I had ever been in.

“We are not what we show. I’m not ready to share my story yet, but I’m with you, I see you, I am you, and I love you,” she continued.” Pain is pain. it’s different and enters each of our lives through a myriad of ways, but each electric stab or dull ache is real. The kind of pain that you can’t see, the pain that lives in the hallow space behind your throat.”
description: Tallulah Willis is paying homage to father Bruce Willis’ career through her Halloween costume this year. In her Instagram post, Willis shared a revealing image of her “Fifth Element”-inspired Halloween costume.
